Event.name: Pre_lose_possession
Event.definition: <def-root>Subframe of Relinquish where the <fen>Owner</fen> (=Donor) has the <fen>Possession</fen> (=Theme).</def-root>

Arg.name: Owner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Owner</fen> is the entity that owns the <fen>Possession</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Possession
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Possession</fen> is the thing which is owned by the <fen>Owner</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Owner">I</fex> <t>have</t> <fex name="Possession">twenty bucks</fex>.</ex> (This does not include bodyparts or medical conditions, but does include intellectual property, etc.)</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any description of the possession state which is not covered by more specific FEs, including epistemic modification (probably, presumably, mysteriously) and general descriptions comparing events (the same way).</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates the <fen>Time</fen> when the Post_lose_posession event occurs. </def-root>
